adaptive.text: Cycles between building up Physical Resistance or Energy Resistance every 8 seconds.
adaptive.title: Adaptive

aggression.text: Every 2 seconds on a timer gain a {0} passive increasing Attack by 50% per stack.  When struck reset the timer and remove the {0} passive stack
aggression.title: Aggression

agressive.text: This defender is more agfressive and excels at offensive abilities like Heavy and Dash Attacks.
agressive.title: Agressive

allornothing.text: This Champion stores Power until its third Special Attack is ready.
allornothing.title: All or Nothing

arcoverload2.text: An Arc Overload triggers every 20 seconds.
arcoverload2.title: Arc Overload 2.0

aspectofevolution.text: Whenever this defender fills a bar of Power, they raise their Attack, Armor, Critical Rating, Critical Resistance, Block Penetration, Power Rate, and Ability Accuracy attributes by 5% for the remainder of the fight.
aspectofevolution.title: Aspect of Evolution

bane.text: The Attacker begins under the effect of a Curse, which deals 2.50% of the opponents current health as Direct Damage per second.  Whenever a Champion with the Curse strikes the other Champion or if the Curse has been on the same Champion for 10 seconds, it passes to the other Champion.
bane.title: Bane

baneofdamballah.text: The defender deals 50% additional damage and has 10% Life Steal as long as their target is under a beneficial effect.
baneofdamballah.title: Bane of Damballah

biohazard.text: When stuck, 20% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 100% of Attack as direct damage over 7.50 seconds. When Blocking an attack 50% chance to inflict Poison, dealing 100% of Attack as direct damage over 7.50 seconds.
biohazard.title: biohazard

bleed100.text: Inflicts Bleed draining 100% Health over 60 seconds.
bleed100.title: Bleed

bloodletting.text: Increase duration of Bleed effects by 100%
bloodletting.title: Bloodletting

breakthrough.text: The Champion starts with +5,000 Armor Rating, but the Opponent reduces their Armor Rating by 200 with each hit.
breakthrough.title: Breakthrough

bruteforce.text: If the Opponent hasn't landed a hit in 6 seconds they begin to Degenerate losing 100% of their total Health over 30 seconds. Landing a hit removes the Degeneration and resets the timer. The strength of this Degeneration is affected by Class Relationships.
bruteforce.title: Brute Force

buffduration.text: All Buffs for this champion last {0}% longer.
buffduration.title: Buff Duration

buffet.text: Every 7 seconds the next Buff triggered by the attacker is immedieatly removed. Each time the efect triggers they Regenerate {0} of their Max Health.
buffet.title: Buffet

burdenofmight.text: The Opponent's Power Gained by striking or being struck by their opponent is reduced by 15% for each Buff currently active on them. Additionally each time a Buff activates on them for any reason, they lose 25% of their Max Power.
burdenofmight.title: Burden of Might

caltrops.text: Dashing backwards against this enemy causes you to Bleed for 6 seconds.
caltrops.title: Caltrops

checkmate.text: Attacks ignore Armor and Evasion with a Combo of 15 or more.
checkmate.title: Checkmate

combolock.text: The Combo Meter is not reset while fighting this enemy.
combolock.title: Combo Lost

cornered.text: Whenever a damage over time Debuff is applied to the Champion, they gain {0}% mode power for the duration of the Debuff.
cornered.title: Cornered

countertactics.text: The Defender increases Base Attack by 20% for each hit of the Attacker's Combo Meter.
countertactics.title: Counter Tactics

defensive.text: This defender is more passive and excels at defensive abilities like Blocking and Dodging.
defensive.title: Defensive

degeneration.text: Inflicts Health Degeneration, draining 0.6% health per second.
degeneration.title: Degeneration

degeneration08.text: Inflicts Health Degeneration, draining 0.8% health per second.
degeneration08.title: Degeneration

dismay.text: Whenever the Attacker loses their highest achieved Combo in a fight, they gain a Degeneration Debuff that deals damage every second equal to {0} times the lost Combo.
dismay.title: Dismay

enhancedarmorbreak.text: Armor Break abilities are 40% more effective.
enhancedarmorbreak.title: Enhanced Armor Break

enhancedarmorup.text: Armor Up abilities are 40% more effective.
enhancedarmorup.title: Enhanced Armor Up

enhancedcritbuff.text: Critical Rate and Damage abilities are 40% more effective.
enhancedcritbuff.title: Enhanced Critical Buffs

enhancedsp1.text: Special 1 deals 30% more damage and cannot be Blocked.
enhancedsp1.title: Enhanced Special 1

enhancedsp2.text: Special 2 deals 20% more damage and cannot be Blocked.
enhancedsp2.title: Enhanced Special 2

enhancedweakening.text: Weakness and Fatigue abbilities are {0}% more effective.
enhancedweakening.title: Enhanced Weakening

explosivepersonality.text: When the Defender Blocks an attack they activate an Armor Up Buff boosting Armor by 25%. Upon reaching 5 stacks of Armor Up generated by Explosive Personality, Armor Up stacks explode and remove 25% of the Attacker's Max Health.
explosivepersonality.title: Explosive Personality

featsofpower.text: When above 1 Bar or Power, gain a Fury Buff. When above 2 Bars of Power, gain a Precision Buff. When at 3 Bars of Power, gain a Cruelty Buff.
featsofpower.title: Feats of Power

fissure.text: Every attack tears and ruptures enemy Armor, inflicting a stacking 1% Armor Break.
fissure.title: Fissure

flare.text: The Opponent gains +300% Attack, but Degenerates 100% of their Max Health over 60 seconds. The strength of the Degeneration is affected by Class Relationships.
flare.title: Flare

fury10.text: A 10% chance to gain Fury, boosting Attack by 100% for 8 seconds.
fury10.title: Fury

godslayer.text: Special Attacks benefit from 50% incresed Critical Hit Damage.
godslayer.title: Godslayer

greatererosion.text: Whenever Block Proficiency or Perfect Block Chance exceeds 66%, up to 2% is lost per second until 66% remains.
greatererosion.title: Greater Block Erosion

healblock.text: Prevent the target from recovering Health.
healblock.title: Heal Block

healblock_special.text: Special Attacks inflict Heal Block, preventing the target from recovering health for 10 seconds.
healblock_special.title: Heal Block

heavyhanded.text: Special Damage increased based on Armor.
heavyhanded.title: Heavy-Handed

infinityblast.text: Blasts a portion of remaning Health. Effectiveness changes to match the Class Relationship of both Champions.
infinityblast.title: Infinity Blast

kineticreactor.text: This enemy generates Power when stiking a Blocking target.
kineticreactor.title: Kinetic Reactor

kingofhellskitchen.text: Heavy Attacks gain +60% Attack and cannot trigger a Passive Evade.
kingofhellskitchen.title: King of Hell's Kitchen

lifetransfer.text: The opponent suffers a permanent Degeneration effect losing 2% of their Max Health per second, but Lifestealing 125% of their Damage done. The Lifesteal percentage is affected by Class Relationships.
lifetransfer.title: Life Transfer

limber.text: Each time this enemy is Stunned, they reduce the duration of Stuns by {0} seconds.
limber.title: Limber

limber_percent.text: Each time this enemy is Stunned, they reduce the duration of Stuns by {0}%.
limber_percent.title: Limber

loss.text: Inflicts health degeneration, draining 100% health per second.
loss.title: Degeneration

masochism.text: Every 7 seconds the next Debuff triggered on this Champion is immedieatly removed. Each time the efect triggers they Regenerate 5% of their Max Health.
masochism.title: Masochism

maximumoverdrive.text: When Punisher 2099 Batter reaches intervals of exactly 25%, he gains 25% of his Max Power over 5 seconds.
maximumoverdrive.title: Maximum Overdrive

mirrorimage.text: Automatically mirrors the beneficial effects of enemies.
mirrorimage.title: Mirror Image

mystic_ward.text: Enemy Nullify effects have a {0}% chance to fail.
mystic_ward.title: Mystic Ward

mysticwardII.text: Enemy Nullify effects have a 80% chance to fail.
mysticwardII.title: Mystic Ward II

oppressivecurse.text: When Morningstar is Blocked, she gains a Soul Charge. Slight delay between Opressive Curse activations.
oppressivecurse.title: Oppressive Curse

optimist.text: Gains Fury, Armor Up, Health Steal as long as they remain below 25% HP.
optimist.title: Optimist

outlast.text: Reduces damage by up to 20% proportionate to missing health.
outlast.title: Outlast

pessimist.text: Gains Fury, Armor Up, and Health Steal as long as they remain above 75% HP
pessimist.title: Pessimist

plaguedmind.text: Attacker's Power is drained every {0} seconds.
plaguedmind.title: Plagued Mind

poison100.text: Inflicts Poison draining 100% Health over 60 seconds.
poison100.title: Poison

powerdrain.text: Special Attacks drain up to 100% Power.
powerdrain.title: Power Drain

powerleak.text: A 50% chance for Critical Hits to cause Power to leak from opponents over time.
powerleak.title: Power Leak

powerreserve.text: Special Attacks for both Champions cost 50% less Power.
powerreserve.title: Power Reserve

powershield.text: The Attackers basic attacks deal no damage, but still generate power, and their Special Attacks deal 400% mode damage.
powershield.title: Power Shield

rage.text: Damage take in a single hit is capped at 2.5% of Max Health.  When damage cap is reached, gain a Fury Buff. Upon reaching 5 Fury Buffs activated by Rage, attacks become Unblockable.
rage.title: Rage

recovery.text: Healing and Regeneration abilities recover {0}% more health.
recovery.title: Recovery

replicate.text: Special attacks have a 90% chance to copy up to 2 effect(s).
replicate.title: Replicate

resistor.text: When struck with an Energy or Physical Attack, activate a corresponding Resistance Buff increasing respective Ressistance by 20%. When and Energy Resistance Buff is activated, remove a Physical Resistance Buff, and vice-versa.
resistor.title: Resistor

resonancecascade.text: Critical Hists increase Critical Hit Rate by 100%
resonancecascade.title: Resonance Cascade

rollingthunder.text: This enemy raises Special Attack Damage by 10% for every 10 Seconds that pass
rollingthunder.title: Rolling Thunder

shatter.text: Nullify abilities shatter theirt argets, dealing 1300 direct damage for each effect Nullified in this way.
shatter.title: Shatter

slashedtires.text: Dashing backwards causes enemy to take 50% of your attack as direct damage.
slashedtires.title: Slashed Tires

softguard.text: Each Blocked attack reduces Block Proficiency by 2%, up to a maximum of 80% reduction.
softguard.title: Soft Guard

specialbias1.text: This defender is more likely to activate Special Attack 1.
specialbias1.title: Special 1 Bias

specialbias2.text: This defender is more likely to activate Special Attack 2.
specialbias2.title: Special 2 Bias

speciallock1.text: Attackers suffer from Power Lock after acquiring one bar of Power.
speciallock1.title: Special Lock 1

spiritofjustice.text: Ghost Rider gains +50% Judgment Ability Accuracy.
spiritofjustice.title: Spirit of Justice

spite.text: While opponents has active Buffs, this champion activates Power Flood out of spite, granting 18% Power per second and Special Attacks a 100% chance to be Unblockable.
spite.title: Spite

stackeddeck.text: Joe Fixit's Double Down ability becomes perminent
stackeddeck.title: Stacked Deck

starburst.text: Suffer Degeneration proportionate to this Champions's missing Health.
starburst.title: Starburst

strike.text: Attacks ignore Armor, Resistance and Evasion.
strike.title: True Strike

strikeback.text: When damaged by a Special Attack, this enemy gains 1 bar of Power.
strikeback.title: Strike Back

stun.text: A 10% chance to inflict Stun for 1.5 seconds.
stun.title: Stun

stunimmune.text: This Champion is immune to the effects of Stun.
stunimmune.title: Stun Immunity

stupefy.text: Increase the duration of Stun effects by 100%
stupefy.title: Stupefy

thirdspecial.text: A third special attack has been activated!
thirdspecial.title: WARNING

thorns.text: Retaliates with 15% attack as Physical Damage when struck by opponent.
thorns.title: Thorns

transducer.text: The enemy rewards more power when struck, but its presence drains your power.
transducer.title: Transducer

tyranny.text: Villains in this arena attain absolute Power. Heroes do not gain Power.
tyranny.title: Tyranny

unblockable_start.text: All attacks are Unblockable for the first 6 seconds of the fight.
unblockable_start.title: Unblockable

vigor.text: Every 15 seconds after the start of the fight.  Regenerate for 50% of Base Health over 5 seconds. The timer refreshes when the Champion reaches intervals of 25% missing Health.
vigor.title: Vigor

villainy.text: Villains in this arena periodically gain Cruelty, increasing Critical Damage by 250% for 7 seconds.
villainy.title: Villainy

aegisheavy1.title: Aegis (Heavy) 1
aegisheavy1.text: Start the fight with Indestructible charges. Being Struck by Heavy Attacks removes 1 charge.

aegisheavy2.title: Aegis (Heavy) 2
aegisheavy2.text: Start the fight with Indestructible charges. Being Struck by Heavy Attacks removes 2 charge.

aegisheavy3.title: Aegis (Heavy) 3
aegisheavy3.text: Start the fight with Indestructible charges. Being Struck by Heavy Attacks removes 3 charges.

aegisintercept1.title: Aegis (Intercept) 1
aegisintercept1.text: Start the fight with Indestructible charges. Dash Attacks from this champion that are Intercepted remove 1 charge.

aegisintercept2.title: Aegis (Intercept) 2
aegisintercept2.text: Start the fight with Indestructible charges. Dash Attacks from this champion that are Intercepted remove 2 charge.

aegisintercept3.title: Aegis (Intercept) 3
aegisintercept3.text: Start the fight with Indestructible charges. Dash Attacks from this champion that are Intercepted remove 3 charge.

aspectofwar.text: Block Proficiency has reached zero, preventing Blocking from reducing any attack damage.
aspectofwar.title: Aspect of War

hurtlocker.text: Using the same type of Special Attack twice in a row gives the Attacker a Delayed Blast charge for 5 seconds which may be removed by landing a Heavy Attack. If the Blast expires, the Attacker takes 50% of their Health as direct damage.
hurtlocker.title: Hurt Locker

immunitybleed.text: The defender is immune to Bleed debuffs.
immunitybleed.title: Immunity (Bleed)

immunitypoison.text: The defender is immune to Poison debuffs.
immunitypoison.title: Immunity (Bleed)

indomitable.text: Whenever the Defenderâ€™s healing abilities would be reversed, they are instead only Heal Blocked.
indomitable.title: Indomitable

kineticinstigator.text: The opponent generates power when striking this champion's Block.
kineticinstigator.title: Kinetic Instigator
